text: The Second Sin is a 1966 South African film. It was written by Ivan Goff and Ben Roberts.SECOND SIN, The Monthly Film Bulletin; London Vol. 35, Iss. 408, (Jan 1, 1968): 27. ==References== ==External links== *The Second Sin at IMDb *The Second Sin at BFI Category:1966 in film Category:1966 films
title: The Second Sin
